body_html: I understand. Would the PyTorch community accept a PR that uses numpy within the __reduce__ methods in order to improve serialization performance of tensor and model objects with naive use of pickle?
body_text: I understand.  Would the PyTorch community accept a PR that uses numpy within the __reduce__ methods in order to improve serialization performance of tensor and model objects with naive use of pickle?
body: I understand.  Would the PyTorch community accept a PR that uses numpy within the `__reduce__` methods in order to improve serialization performance of tensor and model objects with naive use of pickle?
